Pets

From Super Auto Pets Wiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Contents

  • 1 List of Pets

Pets are the player's units in Super Auto Pets. Each type of pet has a unique ability, base Health, and base Attack. Pets are bought from the Shop for 3 Gold each, and placed in the player's team. The player's team can only have 5 pets at once. The player's pets also have a limit of 50 for attack, health, and mana, except for the Behemoth. (for the former two)

Pets in a player's party can be:

  • Repositioned in the team.
  • Sold for 1 Gold per sell value (normally its level).
  • Merged with other pets of the same type to gain Experience, and potentially level up.
  • Fed Food to give them benefits like stat increase, Food Perks, or other.

Pet tiers unlock for purchase every other turn until all tiers are unlocked, with tier 1 available on turn 1 to tier 6 opening up on turn 11. The formula is tier X being unlockable in turn (2X-1). All Pets from all previous tiers of the highest tier can still appear.

In battle, your side of Pets attack in order from right to left with the enemy attacking from left to right.

Some pets have abilities that work well with other pets. See Pet Archetypes.

List of Pets

There are a total of 450 pets. 60 pets are in the Turtle Pack, 29 new pets in Custom Packs. 60 pets are in the Unicorn Pack itself, while 36 new pets are exclusive to Custom Packs but come within the Unicorn Pack. 62 new pets are in the Golden Pack, while 12 new pets are exclusive to custom packs but come within the Golden Pack. 59 new pets are in the Star Pack itself while 26 are exclusive to Custom Packs but come within the Star Pack. 48 new pets are in the Puppy Pack.

A pet is available for use in Custom Packs as long as you own its appropriate pack. All Pets are capable of being in the randomly generated Weekly Packs.

Goat (Chimera) X/X N/A A level 2 Chimera once it faints. X = each mana the Chimera had.
Snake (Chimera) X/X N/A A level 3 Chimera once it faints. X = each mana the Chimera had.
Giant Eyes Dog 6/6 12/12 18/18 N/A A Tinder Box once the front space is empty during battle.
Chick X/1 N/A A Rooster once it faints. X is a variable for half of the Rooster's attack.
Salmon Salmon's stats are inherited from the pet the Pelican swallowed.
Level 1 Summoned: Deal 5 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for every 25 health this has.
Level 2 Summoned: Deal 10 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for every 25 health this has.
Level 3 Summoned: Deal 15 damage to a random enemy. Repeat for every 25 health this has.
A Pelican once it faints (if it successfully swallowed a pet during the Start of Battle).
Nessie? X/(2*X) Although not mentioned by the game, it stocks a Peg Leg once it faints outside battle. A Nessie once it faints. X = 1/2/3 multiplied by the number of rolls this turn (up to 7)
Good Dog Good Dog's stats are inherited from the converted Bad Dog.
Level 1 Start of battle: Give friends plenty of useful(?) perks!
Level 2 Start of battle: Give friends silly amounts of useful(?) perks!
Level 3 Start of battle: Give friends silly amounts of useful(?) perks!
A Bad Dog whenever it's fed Holy Water and transforms.
Zombie Fly 4/4 8/8 12/12 N/A Upon any Pet fainting when a Fly is alive and has more than 0 triggers. A Zombie Fly will not be summoned upon the death of another Zombie Fly
Mimic Octopus Mimic Octopus's stats are inherited from the pet it was transformed from.
Level 1 After attack: Deal 4 damage to the least healthy enemy.
Level 2 After attack: Deal 4 damage to the 2 least healthy enemies.
Level 3 After attack: Deal 4 damage to the 3 least healthy enemies.
An Ammonite once it faints
Young Phoenix 6/6 12/12 18/18 N/A A Phoenix once it faints.
Fire Pup 8/8 N/A A Cerberus once the front space is empty during battle. The Cerberus can summon 1/2/3 Fire Pups in battle, depending on its level.

Uniquely, a front most Fire Pup fainting is capable of being replaced by another Fire Pup (provided the Cerberus has enough triggers).

Hydra Head 5/5 10/10 15/15 N/A A Hydra once it faints. Hydra summons 1 Head for each 10 attack it has.
Golden Retriever X/X N/A The second to last pet fainting while the team possesses Trumpet(s). X = Number of available Trumpets
Rock Rock's stats are inherited from the pet it was transformed from. If converted by a Basilisk, it also gains +2 health for the Basilisk's level. N/A A Basilisk and a Cockatrice once they find relevant targets that fit their criteria.
Moby Dick 8/8
Level 1 Start of battle: Remove this!
Level 2 & 3 Summoned & Start of battle: Remove this!
Buying the Peg Leg (obtained by knocking out a Nessie? in the shop). It is described as the "Achievement hunter's bane".

Sloth Sloth✝
A ✝ denotes that a pet coexists in another pack, symbolised with the image of pet to the right of it. A ✮ denotes that a pet is native to said pack, but can only be used in Custom Packs.
